QuestData.Title: A Crack in the Armor
QuestData.Description:
The artifacts you helped excavate show the Amathet as a tribe who prided themselves on protecting the works of the titans.
This confirms our assumptions, and indicates that something drastic must have happened to them to cause them to damage the very works they swore to protect.
We should continue to track down their writings. I think I saw a more recent monument outside the Halls of Origination.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defend High Explorer Dellorah as she deciphers the Amathet Monument outside the Halls of Origination.
